channel.title: Only doing the task when you get to the NPC/Object
channel.description:
I've tryed a few times but i can't do it =X
I need to know how to make it only do whatever it's meant to do (Eg. Open the bank) when you get to the object/npc (Eg. the bank booth).
Because atm when you talk to the Zammy Mage i made the dialogue opens from like edge level 1 lol, so you can just click teleport me to the abyss from a mile away so it hardly makes a risk with rcing ;X

item.title: Only doing the task when you get to the NPC/Object
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Hmm, I’m not sure what the methods are, but you could probably make it only works if the player is near the object; using absX and absY -1(probably).

There’s a gotoObject method, or something like it. Take a look at it.
